languages.text: "По меркам Арбитес я уже погряз в ереси, но знаете, меня не пугает их осуждение..."
"By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me..."
languages.original_text: "По меркам Арбитес я уже погряз в ереси, но знаете, меня не пугает их осуждение..."

traits.locale_text: "By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me..."
"By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me..."
"By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me..."
"By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me..."
"By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me..."

languages.text: "Gemäß Arbitratoren-Standards stehe ich bereits bis zu den Knien in Ketzerei, aber ganz ehrlich, ihre Verdammung kümmert mich nicht ..."
languages.original_text: "By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me..."

traits.locale_text: "Gemäß Arbitratoren-Standards stehe ich bereits bis zu den Knien in Ketzerei, aber ganz ehrlich, ihre Verdammung kümmert mich nicht ..."

languages.text: « Si l'on se fie aux standards des arbitrators, j'ai déjà largement succombé à l'hérésie, mais, à vrai dire, cette condamnation ne me décourage aucunement... »
languages.original_text: "By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me..."

traits.locale_text: « Si l'on se fie aux standards des arbitrators, j'ai déjà largement succombé à l'hérésie, mais, à vrai dire, cette condamnation ne me décourage aucunement... »

languages.text: “如果按照法务官的标准，我已经深陷异端邪说之中，但老实说，我根本不在乎他们如何谴责我……”
languages.original_text: "By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me..."

traits.locale_text: “如果按照法务官的标准，我已经深陷异端邪说之中，但老实说，我根本不在乎他们如何谴责我……”

languages.text: «Para los Arbitrator soy un hereje de la peor calaña, pero a decir verdad su censura no me preocupa...».
languages.original_text: "By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me..."

traits.locale_text: «Para los Arbitrator soy un hereje de la peor calaña, pero a decir verdad su censura no me preocupa...».

languages.text: 「アービトレイターの基準からすれば、私はすでに異端にどっぷりと浸かっていることになります。ですが率直に言うと、もはや彼らの非難などでは私を止めることはできません…」
languages.original_text: "By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me..."

traits.locale_text: 「アービトレイターの基準からすれば、私はすでに異端にどっぷりと浸かっていることになります。ですが率直に言うと、もはや彼らの非難などでは私を止めることはできません…」

languages.text: "Yargıcı ilkelerine göre zaten dizlerime kadar kâfirliğe batmış durumdayım ancak açıkçası kınanma hissiyatı beni asla caydırmıyor."
languages.original_text: "By Arbitrator standards, I am already knee-deep in heresy, but, frankly, their condemnation does not deter me..."

traits.locale_text: "Yargıcı ilkelerine göre zaten dizlerime kadar kâfirliğe batmış durumdayım ancak açıkçası kınanma hissiyatı beni asla caydırmıyor."
